title: Iced chocolate traybake
ingredients: ['For the chocolate cake traybake', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder', '4 tablespoons hot water, or as needed', '225g butter, softened', '225g caster sugar', '275g self-raising flour', '2 level teaspoons baking powder', '4 eggs, beaten', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract (optional)', '4 tablespoons milk', 'For the icing', '40g cocoa powder', '300g icing sugar, or as needed', '5 tablespoons milk, or as needed', 'grated chocolate for decoration (optional)']
